i just cant believe it was all a lie

verse 2
i found a book of matches some place weve never been

rescue me my heart is breaking

chorus
say it isnt so tell me its not true
say it isnt so i believe in you
tell me its a lie i dont need no proof
say everythings alright couldnt be not you
say it isnt so

verse 2
superman dont fly they did all with strings

like some tacky cheesy bathing beauty
